summary: This is an FBI email chain from June 30, 2020, concerning the draft operational plan (OPLAN) for the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. The email requests review and forwarding to ASAC Creasey for final approval.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the draft operational plan (OPLAN) for her arrest.

persons.name: Creasey
persons.context: The individual to whom the final approved OPLAN needs to be forwarded for final approval.

connections.description: Creasey, as an ASAC, is involved in the approval process for the operational plan to arrest Maxwell.

events.title: Draft Arrest OPLAN for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An FBI email discusses a draft operational plan for the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell and seeks review and final approval.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively planning the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell as of June 30, 2020.
The planning involved a formal operational plan (OPLAN) requiring review and final approval from an ASAC named Creasey.
The email indicates coordination between FBI personnel, with the sender's and recipient's names redacted but their offices (NY, BS) noted.
